title: Community So Uninviting
body:
I thought EvE Online was bad, this is by far the worst and the most toxic community of any PvP centric game I have ever played. 
Talk about some sandbaggers railing new players is quite the achievement and most rewarding Esport ever! Some TRUE Keyboard Commandos!
If just picking up the game and learning is ruining your fun your standards must be REALLY LOW! Especially those pushing through **"C -" Unranked** because you're killing it!
